name: For The Love of Dice
description:
Test your coordination skills and match the dice patterns shown in yellow in this game of coordination and chance!

Click or tap on dice in yellow and follow the pattern shown in yellow. You must hurry though, the timer is not very friendly. Each correct pattern adds 1 second on the clock, and some points under your belt while a wrong answer takes away 1 second and ends your score multiplier. Every 6 rounds, 5 seconds is added to your timer.

Let's see those highscores!!

Mobile Friendly!!
